IX.iii.1.J.5.s
.
Definition:  Asset Associated Income
Asset associated income
is income that may have an underlying asset.
Examples
:  rental income, capital gains, interest and dividends.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section J - Net Worth, Asset Transfers, and Penalty Periods
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section J
